practiceAreas: Bankruptcy|Business Law|Criminal Defense|Elder Law|Employment Law|Estate Planning|Family Law|Personal Injury|Probate & Estate Administration
description:
Located in Cabot, Arkansas, WH Law Offices provides a comprehensive range of quality legal services and effective counsel in a variety of practice areas to help you, your company and your family with virtually any legal need you may have.

Based in North Little Rock, our law firm has grown to include five total offices across central Arkansas, making us one of our region's most prominent and premier legal practices for those dealing with complex challenges involving any of the following:

• Bankruptcy
• Business law
• Employment law
• Estate planning
• Probate and estate administration
• Elder law
• Criminal defense
• Family law
• Personal injury

Our unprecedented growth lends credence to the level of success we have achieved assisting a diverse range of clients throughout our area with all of their pressing legal issues. Moreover, our attorneys have earned top rankings and endorsements from our peers as well as "Superb" client ratings on Avvo, and we are proud to be able to assist so many in our community in their times of need.

No matter how complex your situation or the goals you wish to achieve, you can rely on our attorneys' decades of combined legal experience to help see you through. We promise to work closely with you throughout all legal proceedings to increase your chances of obtaining the favorable outcome you expect and deserve.

Our law firm offers free initial consultations along with affordable, transparent fee schedules, so you have nothing to lose and everything to gain by contacting WH Law Offices and speaking with one of our dedicated team members. In an effort to help keep you and your family safe, we also offer virtual consultations so that you do not have to leave the safety and comfort of your home to speak with us.

We are a debt relief agency. We help people file for bankruptcy relief under the Bankruptcy Code.
